Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Brad Pitt said "Trump is not my president" when there is no evidence to support this.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no documented example of Brad Pitt saying "Trump is not my president."
Problematic assumption: The claim makes a problematic assumption by attributing quotes to Brad Pitt that were actually made by someone else.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Brad Pitt made a satirical cameo on The Jim Jefferies Show but did not mention Trump or the Paris climate agreement.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation exists as the claim wrongly attributes comments critical of Trump to Brad Pitt's appearance on The Jim Jefferies Show.
